channel.title: Ethernet Ports not allowing connection to the UI
channel.description: I've inadvertently changed a setting for the Slate AX 1800. I cannot connect to the router via an Ethernet cable. I entered 172.17.17.2 into the browser, and it will not connect. I have tried Lan 2 and the WAN ports with no luck. I have even tried to roll back the firmware with no luck. I appreciate your help in advance.

item.title: Ethernet Ports not allowing connection to the UI
item.dc:creator: TalalM
item.description:
No problem, I need to make the text bigger on the Slate AX diagram.


New:

Read full topic
item.source: Ethernet Ports not allowing connection to the UI

item.title: Ethernet Ports not allowing connection to the UI
item.dc:creator: Hoochthefireman
item.description:
After reflashing to the original firmware and then the alternate install of smoothWAN, still had no luck. I realized I needed the ethernet to be connected third port (LAN 2), and everything worked. I was connected to WAN 1 and 2 when trying to connect the router. Thanks for your time with this. Feeling a little silly. lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Ethernet Ports not allowing connection to the UI

item.title: Ethernet Ports not allowing connection to the UI
item.dc:creator: TalalM
item.description:
To rule out image corruption, try reflashing the WebUI image over Wi-Fi by following the alternative instructions in releases page.
